name: Butte
description: A smaller, isolated butte stands as a landmark in open terrain, often containing hidden caves or ancient ruins. Its prominence makes it a perfect lookout point, but also makes travelers easy targets for distant observers. Additionally, isolated, flat-topped hills create dramatic landmarks and natural defensive positions. the prominence provides excellent visibility and defensive advantages, while the isolated nature makes them vulnerable to siege.
atmosphere: Lone sentinel with distinctive silhouette visible for miles. Still, quiet air broken by wind whisper through sparse vegetation. Rock face radiates sun heat. Dry earth and stone scent. From top: complete isolation - see everything, everything sees you. Profound silence makes footsteps echo.
